<script>

//Alterar labels de botões
$(document).ready(function(){
    $("input#assignmentComplete").val("CONCLUIR");
    $("input#saveAsDraft").val("GUARDAR");
    $("button#cancel").html("CANCELAR");
     
    var mode = "#requestParam._mode#";
    if(mode=='edit'){
        $("button#cancel").html("VOLTAR");
    }
    
     $( "form" ).submit(function(){
        var btnVal = $(document.activeElement).val();
        if(btnVal === 'GUARDAR'){
            window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "guardar");
        }
         
         
         
     });
});

</script>

<script>

    $(document).change(function(){
        //var faseProcesso = '#variable.faseProcesso#';
        //console.log(faseProcesso);
        
        var faseProcesso = $("select[id*=_faseProcesso]").val(); 
        var historico =  $("input[id*=_historico]").val(); 
        if(faseProcesso === undefined){
            faseProcesso = $('input[id*=atualizar_fase]').val();
        }
  
         $("button[rel=2]").hide();
         $("button[rel=3]").hide();
         $("button[rel=4]").hide();
        if(historico.contains("TC") && historico.contains("RB")  && historico.contains("LV")  ){
            $("button[rel=2]").show();
            $("button[rel=3]").show();
            $("button[rel=4]").show();
        }else if(historico.contains("TC") && historico.contains("RB") && !historico.contains("LV")){
            $("button[rel=2]").show();
            $("button[rel=3]").show();
            $("button[rel=4]").hide();
        }else if(historico.contains("TC") && !historico.contains("RB") && historico.contains("LV")){
            $("button[rel=2]").show();
            $("button[rel=3]").hide();
            $("button[rel=4]").show();
        } else if(!historico.contains("TC") && historico.contains("RB") && historico.contains("LV")){
            $("button[rel=2]").hide();
            $("button[rel=3]").show();
            $("button[rel=4]").show();
        }
       
  });

</script>
